alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 3:05AM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Northern and Southwestern St. Lawrence, Eastern Clinton, and Eastern Essex Counties. In Vermont, Grand Isle, Caledonia, Washington, Orange, and Windsor Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet snow accumulation on trees and power lines will increase the likelihood of power outages, especially in central and eastern Vermont.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
